name: Task Management Application
description: A web-based task management application that allows teams to create, assign, track, and complete tasks with real-time collaboration features.
vision: To become the most intuitive and collaborative task management platform for small to medium-sized teams.
mission: Simplify team collaboration by providing an elegant, powerful, and accessible task management solution.
goals: Provide intuitive task organization and filtering
target_audience: Small to medium-sized teams (5-50 members) in technology, marketing, and consulting industries who need collaborative task management.

user_stories.action: create and assign tasks to team members
user_stories.benefit: can clearly communicate responsibilities and deadlines

user_stories.action: view task progress and team workload
user_stories.benefit: can make informed decisions about resource allocation

user_stories.action: receive notifications for task updates and mentions
user_stories.benefit: can stay informed about relevant changes
can control access and maintain security
can discuss details and resolve questions in context
can track progress without being involved in every task

core.title: User Authentication
core.description: Secure user registration and login with email/password and optional OAuth (Google, GitHub)

core.title: Task Creation & Management
core.description: Create, edit, delete, and organize tasks with titles, descriptions, due dates, priorities, and tags

core.title: Task Assignment
core.description: Assign tasks to team members with clear ownership and notification

core.title: Real-time Updates
core.description: Instant updates when tasks are modified, completed, or commented on

core.title: Task Comments
core.description: Comment system for discussion and collaboration on tasks

core.title: Dashboard & Views
core.description: Personal dashboard, team view, and project-specific views with filtering and sorting

core.title: Notifications
core.description: Email and in-app notifications for task assignments, updates, and mentions

core.title: Search & Filter
core.description: Powerful search and filtering capabilities by assignee, status, priority, tags, and dates

optional.title: File Attachments
optional.description: Attach files to tasks for reference and collaboration

optional.title: Time Tracking
optional.description: Track time spent on tasks for reporting and billing

optional.title: Mobile App
optional.description: Native mobile applications for iOS and Android

technical.title: API Rate Limiting
technical.description: Implement rate limiting to prevent abuse

technical.title: Data Backup
technical.description: Automated daily backups with point-in-time recovery

technical.title: Caching Layer
technical.description: Redis caching for frequently accessed data

success_metrics.name: User Adoption
success_metrics.measurement: Database query of active teams with >= 5 tasks

success_metrics.name: Task Completion Rate
success_metrics.target: 80% of tasks completed within due date
success_metrics.measurement: Backend analytics on task completion timestamps

success_criteria: Launch MVP with core features within 4 months
Onboard 50 beta testers and achieve 80% satisfaction rate
Pass security audit before public launch
Complete integration with at least 2 OAuth providers (Google, GitHub)
out_of_scope: Advanced project management features (Gantt charts, resource leveling)
open_questions: Should we support task dependencies in MVP or Phase 2?
What is the maximum team size we should optimize for?
Do we need to support task templates?
Should we implement kanban board view in MVP?
What is our strategy for data migration if users want to export their data?
